tags: fantastic beast and where to find them
summary: I understand how some people feel about JKR and the Harry Potter series ( including fantastic beast and where to find them) but...
body: I understand how some people feel about JKR and the Harry Potter series ( including fantastic beast and where to find them) but can you try not to destroy other people’s views on these series? I personally don’t want something I grew up loving being poisoned by the hateful negative views of others and I’m sure younger fans don’t want it happening either

blog.name: sapphicfanapphic
blog.title: Waffles Of A Teen
blog.description: I like writing and reading and those are basically the only semi interesting things about me but I’m not dead yet so I’ve got that going for me - I tried really hard to not make this sound like a shitty tinder bio and I failed at my one job

body:
Peter Pettigrew

There’s so many good mauraders headcanons or imagines or drawings etc. All over the tumblr but you know what gets me? The fact that Peter Pettigrew is either A - a shy boy who just wants friends but is kinda stupid and needs to be helped or B - he’s not included in the piece of work. This really annoys me, his character is so interesting that I think leaving him out is such an injustice, yes thinking about him being friends with the others is sad because we know his betrayal but he was still there, he was still a friend. I also don’t believe that he would have been such an integral part if he had have been completely stupid and useless. I’m not saying that James, Sirius or Remus would have been rude but I think it would have been more of a Neville situation, they would have liked him and considered him a friend but not such a friend as to bring him along for everything and given him a part in the Mauraders. I think he was clever, I mean he managed to hide his rat like ways from them despite the fact that he was a literal rat. He also tricked the wizarding government (who really could have looked more into that situation) into thinking he was dead and that Sirius was to blame. My theory is that he was very charming (in a nerdy way) and could talk his way out of most things. Think about it right, Sirius was smart and charming and had that bad boy thing and liked the reputation that getting caught got him so he never really tried to talk himself out of anything. James while also being smart and charming, just didn’t mind the consequences of his actions, he didn’t really want to spend his free time in detention but it wasn’t bad with his friends and he knew his parents loved him too much to really be angry. Remus was great at excuses and thinking of ways to get out of trouble, the only issue was that Remus didn’t always bother, sure he could, but where’s the thrill in that, also it was sometimes fun to see Sirius and James’ faces when he talked himself out of a punishment but not them, he had that evil streak in him, of course he would always apologise with chocolate afterwards. Now Peter on the other hand, he was desperate for people to like him, he could somehow talk all four of them out of trouble and have the teacher laughing away at the same time, one second their hands were covered in the red dye they had used to turn the green in the Slytherin Quittich robes into a Gryffindor red and the next second the teacher was walking away laughing about “Dumbledore and his newfound love of fish”, the boys don’t know how he does it, all they know is that he is a true friend, the kind who wouldn’t leave one behind. That is why Peter’s betrayal hurts so bad, because he was a true friend, he had a personality of his own and he wasn’t just a bad copycat of one of the others, he wasn’t basically non existent. He was there and they loved him and then he got them killed. Peter’s role should not be diminished, yes his betrayal hurts them which in turn hurts us but that’s what makes him such an interesting character, he has so many layers, not just a sad wimp or someone who can be written out.

blog.name: helenanothere
blog.title: I'm fine
blog.description: bottomless Falsettos trashcan, this is my brain dump (mostly musicals oops)

tags: way too many tags for me to handle
imma stop listing all the musicals in the tags
what am i doing no one is going to see this anyway
guess it's for myself and my lonely fangirl heart
broadway suddenly seems a very gryffinpuff place
summary: What if we sort musicals into Hogwarts houses?
title: What if we sort musicals into Hogwarts houses?
body:
Gryffindor: Hamilton, Newsies, Les Mis

Slytherin: Heathers, Chicago, Sweeney Todd

Ravenclaw: Dear Evan Hansen, Book of Mormon, Phantom of the Opera

Hufflepuff: Come From Away, Wicked, Sound of Music, In the Heights, Waitress

I just put whatever came up in my mind but SUGGESTIONS? I’M EXCITED

edit: OMG I get the trend now: Gryffindor’s revolution af; Slytherin’s… Slytherin; Ravenclaw is the really freaking morally ambiguous and philosophically questionable but really sweet at the same time; Hufflepuff is… everything else? (okay okay no,, more like the sweet, fluffy, feel-good PG ones that just warm you in a cold winter)

summary:
When you get everything you love under one roof but you’re broke AF:
Me: I want it all, how much will it be?
Store girl: A...
body:
When you get everything you love under one roof but you’re broke AF:

Me: I want it all, how much will it be?

Store girl: A couple thousand dollars.

Me: Will you take a kidney?

blog.description: Percy, 20yo german enby. I post things that make me happy or whatever I'm obsessed with at the time. Icon by @noodles-art-blog ^w^

summary: I love how closely the pets of the Golden Trio mirror certain aspects of their respective owners personality or just things that...
body:
I love how closely the pets of the Golden Trio mirror certain aspects of their respective owners personality or just things that happened to them in the story like,

Crookshanks is clever and smart, able to figure out important things before others, just like Hermione

Hedwig literally dies in the 7th book, just like Harry

and Scabbers turns out to be the one who betrayed Harrys parents and has secretly been working for Voldemort, just like Ron

it’s fascinating

trail.content:
I love how closely the pets of the Golden Trio mirror certain aspects of their respective owners personality or just things that happened to them in the story like,

Crookshanks is clever and smart, able to figure out important things before others, just like Hermione

Hedwig literally dies in the 7th book, just like Harry

and Scabbers turns out to be the one who betrayed Harrys parents and has secretly been working for Voldemort, just like Ron

it’s fascinating

blog.name: marvolord
blog.title: mind if I slither in?
blog.description: | 22 | German | Christina | Harry Potter trash | Tom Riddle | Tomarry | getting back into writing |

summary:
Coldness  

The light pouring in through the high windows already illuminated the common room in a dark green hue when Tom came...
body:
Coldness 

The light pouring in through the high windows already illuminated the common room in a dark green hue when Tom came back from dinner. The large room was vacant. No other Slytherins had to stay at the castle over the holidays and it left Tom standing in a deafening silence. The peace he so often craved seemed to only coexist with the noises evoked by his housemates. He would not go as far as to say he was missing them though. He did not.

keep reading

I wrote this one shot for the 25 Days of Yule challenge by @thepotternet and @fanficnet , Day 1: Tom Riddle - Coldness

summary: Y’all know that super sad song called tea and toast?? It’s totally a Hinny song and I’m fucking loving it. (Also maaaaybbbeeee...
body:
Y’all know that super sad song called tea and toast?? It’s totally a Hinny song and I’m fucking loving it. (Also maaaaybbbeeee Scorpius and rose (or Albus) it’s just cute)


“When the skies are looking bad my dear

And your heart’s lost all its hope

After dawn there will be sunshine

And all the dust will go

The skies will clear my darling

I’ll wake up with the one I love the most

And in the morning, I’ll make you up

Some tea and toast”
